Ramblings II

27 Dec 2017

Today I am in the Golden Lion, one of my favourite pubs in Guernsey. I am with old friends, and it feels comforting. A girl has complimented me on my nails, which was strange to say the least. I am excited for dinner and further drinks, I feel alive.
